description: Try our easy to follow Mixed Berry Cordial recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mixed Berry Cordial Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: soda water, chilled (lemonade or sparkling white wine)

recipeInstructions.text: Place 300g mixed fresh or frozen berries, 11/2 cups white sugar and 1/4 cup lemon juice in a heatproof bowl. Add 1 cup boiling water. Stir until sugar has dissolved. Strain cordial through a sieve, pressing down with the back of a spoon, into a large heatproof jug.
To serve, pour 1/4 cup of the berry cordial into each glass. Top with chilled soda water, lemonade or sparkling white wine. Add ice and fresh mint sprigs to garnish.
